import React from 'react'; const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', password2: '', }); const { name, email, password, password2 } = formData; const onChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); return ( <>
